languages.text: "Мы продолжим очищение усадьбы и прилегающих территорий — от завалов, трупов и прочих последствий боев. Уцелевших сил хватит, чтобы дать отпор случайным атакам врага, буде они состоятся — по последним сведениями ксеносы начали массовый отвод своих сил. Если вас зовут иные дела, я не смею больше задерживать вас — позвольте нам позаботиться о том, чтобы Даргонус был возвращен к былой славе".

"We will continue the clean-up of the estate and the neighbouring territories — we must deal with the rubble, the corpses, and any other aftereffects of the fighting. The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned to its former glory."
languages.original_text: "Мы продолжим очищение усадьбы и прилегающих территорий — от завалов, трупов и прочих последствий боев. Уцелевших сил хватит, чтобы дать отпор случайным атакам врага, буде они состоятся — по последним сведениями ксеносы начали массовый отвод своих сил. Если вас зовут иные дела, я не смею больше задерживать вас — позвольте нам позаботиться о том, чтобы Даргонус был возвращен к былой славе".

traits.locale_text: "We will continue the cleanup of the estate and the neighboring territories — we must deal with the rubble, the corpses, and any other aftereffects of the fighting. The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned its former glory."

The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned to its former glory."

languages.text: 「屋敷と屋敷隣接する領域の片づけを続けます。がれき、死体、その他戦闘の後遺症に対処する必要がございます。散発的な敵の攻撃があったとしても、生き残った部隊で十分に撃退できるでしょう。最新の報告によれば、異種族は一斉撤退しております。もし、他に用事がおありでしたら、これ以上は引き止めません。ダルゴナスにかつての栄光を取り戻すために我々も最善を尽くします」
languages.original_text: "We will continue the clean-up of the estate and the neighbouring territories — we must deal with the rubble, the corpses, and any other aftereffects of the fighting. The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned to its former glory."

traits.locale_text: 「屋敷と屋敷隣接する領域の片づけを続けます。がれき、死体、その他戦闘の後遺症に対処する必要がございます。散発的な敵の攻撃があったとしても、生き残った部隊で十分に撃退できるでしょう。最新の報告によれば、異種族は一斉撤退しております。もし、他に用事がおありでしたら、これ以上は引き止めません。ダルゴナスにかつての栄光を取り戻すために我々も最善を尽くします」

languages.text: “我们准备继续清扫城区与邻近地区，处理战后的废墟、尸体和其他遗留物。这片地区目前剩余的兵力，足以应付敌人可能发动的任何零星反扑，如果他们真的打算反扑的话。因为最新报告显示，异形已经开始大规模撤退了。您公务繁忙，我就不再耽误您的时间了。请允许我们同心协力，共同恢复达戈努斯昔日的辉煌。”
languages.original_text: "We will continue the clean-up of the estate and the neighbouring territories — we must deal with the rubble, the corpses, and any other aftereffects of the fighting. The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned to its former glory."

traits.locale_text: “我们准备继续清扫城区与邻近地区，处理战后的废墟、尸体和其他遗留物。这片地区目前剩余的兵力，足以应付敌人可能发动的任何零星反扑，如果他们真的打算反扑的话。因为最新报告显示，异形已经开始大规模撤退了。您公务繁忙，我就不再耽误您的时间了。请允许我们同心协力，共同恢复达戈努斯昔日的辉煌。”

languages.text: «Continuaremos con la limpieza de sus terrenos y los territorios colindantes. Debemos librarnos de los escombros, los cadáveres y otras secuelas del combate. Las fuerzas supervivientes bastarán para rechazar cualquier ataque esporádico y los últimos informes confirman que los xenos han emprendido una retirada masiva. Si hay algún otro asunto que exija su atención, no deje que le detenga. Permita que nos ocupemos de devolver a Dargonus su anterior gloria».
languages.original_text: "We will continue the clean-up of the estate and the neighbouring territories — we must deal with the rubble, the corpses, and any other aftereffects of the fighting. The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned to its former glory."

traits.locale_text: «Continuaremos con la limpieza de sus terrenos y los territorios colindantes. Debemos librarnos de los escombros, los cadáveres y otras secuelas del combate. Las fuerzas supervivientes bastarán para rechazar cualquier ataque esporádico y los últimos informes confirman que los xenos han emprendido una retirada masiva. Si hay algún otro asunto que exija su atención, no deje que le detenga. Permita que nos ocupemos de devolver a Dargonus su anterior gloria».

languages.text: « Nous allons poursuivre le nettoyage de la zone et de ses alentours. Nous devons évacuer les décombres et les cadavres afin de faire disparaître toute trace des combats. Les soldats survivants devraient être en mesure de repousser les attaques ennemies, le cas échéant, mais selon les derniers rapports, les xénos sont en train de battre en retraite. Je ne vous retiens pas plus longtemps, d'autres sujets doivent requérir votre attention. Nous veillerons à ce que Dargonus retrouve sa grandeur passée. »
languages.original_text: "We will continue the clean-up of the estate and the neighbouring territories — we must deal with the rubble, the corpses, and any other aftereffects of the fighting. The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned to its former glory."

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons poursuivre le nettoyage de la zone et de ses alentours. Nous devons évacuer les décombres et les cadavres afin de faire disparaître toute trace des combats. Les soldats survivants devraient être en mesure de repousser les attaques ennemies, le cas échéant, mais selon les derniers rapports, les xénos sont en train de battre en retraite. Je ne vous retiens pas plus longtemps, d'autres sujets doivent requérir votre attention. Nous veillerons à ce que Dargonus retrouve sa grandeur passée. »

languages.text: "Wir werden die Säuberung des Anwesens und der benachbarten Territorien fortsetzen – wir müssen uns um die Trümmer, die Leichen und alle anderen Überreste der Kämpfe kümmern. Die überlebenden Truppen können sporadische feindliche Angriffe zurückschlagen, so es welche geben sollte – den letzten Berichten zufolge ziehen die Xenos sich in Massen zurück. Falls andere Angelegenheiten Eure Aufmerksamkeit erfordern, will ich Euch nicht länger aufhalten – bitte gestattet uns, Dargonus seine frühere Pracht zurückzubringen."
languages.original_text: "We will continue the clean-up of the estate and the neighbouring territories — we must deal with the rubble, the corpses, and any other aftereffects of the fighting. The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned to its former glory."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden die Säuberung des Anwesens und der benachbarten Territorien fortsetzen – wir müssen uns um die Trümmer, die Leichen und alle anderen Übererste der Kämpfe kümmern. Die überlebenden Truppen können sporadische feindliche Angriffe zurückschlagen, so es welche geben sollte – den letzten Berichten zufolge ziehen die Xenos sich in Massen zurück. Falls andere Angelegenheiten Eure Aufmerksamkeit erfordern, will ich Euch nicht länger aufhalten – bitte gestattet uns, Dargonus seine frühere Pracht zurückzubringen."

languages.text: "Konak arazisini ve çevre bölgeleri temizlemeyi sürdüreceğiz. Yıkıntılar, cesetler ve çatışmaların diğer sonuçlarıyla ilgilenmek gerek. Olur da ani saldırılarla karşı karşıya kalırsak hayatta kalan kuvvetlerimizin varlığı yeterli olacaktır. Son bildirilere göre zenolar topyekûn geri çekiliyormuş. Başka işleriniz vardır, sizi daha fazla tutmayayım. Dargonus'u bize emanet edebilirsiniz, gezegeni eski şanına kavuşturacağız."
languages.original_text: "We will continue the clean-up of the estate and the neighbouring territories — we must deal with the rubble, the corpses, and any other aftereffects of the fighting. The surviving forces will be enough to repel any sporadic enemy attacks if any are launched — according to the latest reports, the xenos are pulling out en masse. If other matters require your attention, I won't detain you any longer — please allow us to ensure that Dargonus is returned to its former glory."

traits.locale_text: "Konağı ve çevresindeki bölgeleri temizlemeyi sürdüreceğiz. Yıkıntılar, cesetler ve çatışmaların diğer kalıntıları halledilecek. Olur da ani saldırılarla karşı karşıya kalırsak hayatta kalan kuvvetlerimiz yeterli gelecektir. Son bildirilere göre zenolar topyekûn geri çekiliyormuş. Başka işleriniz vardır, sizi daha fazla tutmayayım. Dargonus’u bize emanet edebilirsiniz, onu eski şanına kavuşturacağız."
